name: Source Number Crystal
description: Used to fully restore a sprite's status (100%)

name: Source Number Powder
description: Used to partially restore a sprite's status (50%)

name: Escape Scroll
description: Used to allow a sprite to escape from battle

name: Low-Level Ball
description: Used to capture and store sprites

name: Mid-Level Ball
description: Used to capture and store sprites (higher success rate)

name: High-Level Ball
description: Used to capture and store sprites (highest success rate)

name: Treasure Chest
description: Used to capture and store sprites (highest success rate)
